name: Sift
description:
Sift

By Austin Manning and John Prentice

Wander through the internet in search of the truth. During your search you will run into other people on the internet and how you interact with them will determine if you find the TRUTH.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move and use shift to sprint.

Press Esc to quit.

In "debates" use the buttons on screen to debate the other user
